name: fastgpt-chrome-extension
description: Chrome extension for FastGPT knowledge base integration

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run sync-version && webpack --mode=production
scripts.build:dev: npm run clean && npm run sync-version && webpack --mode=development
scripts.package: npm run build && npm run zip
scripts.version:patch: npm version patch --no-git-tag-version && npm run sync-version
scripts.version:minor: npm version minor --no-git-tag-version && npm run sync-version
scripts.version:major: npm version major --no-git-tag-version && npm run sync-version
